name: Map Fog Viewer
author: Excrulon
description: Allows players to see the fog on the map as red tiles instead of the hard to see default fog. Makes exploration really easy!

name: Monster Tracker
author: Excrulon
description: Displays monster kills on the screen so you can know when you have completed your journal entry and can retrieve your reward.

name: Experience Viewer
author: Excrulon
description: A handy window that allows you to view all types of experience data! Includes current and required experience, experience percent, kills needed for a level, experience per hour, and estimated time until level up.

name: Channel Surfer
author: Excrulon
description: Removes the confirmation box when changing channels, expands the channel drop down box to display more channels, and adds buttons that lets you quickly cycle through channels.

name: Monster Frames
author: Excrulon
description: Enhances the monster frames by displaying HP, race, attribute, armor, size, move type, kill counts, and more!

name: Better Quest
author: gibbed
description: Enhanced quest window that allows you to see all quests that you are eligible for! Makes it very easy to find all quests that you've missed.

name: Show Invested Stat Points
author: mc-crafty
description: Enhanced stat window that allows you to see how many points you've put into each stat.
